expandedLimited.Label: Use Expanded Sheet as Limited
expandedLimited.Hint: Show the full character sheet for users who have the Limited permission for a given Actor.

showSpellSlotBubbles.Label: Display spell slot bubbles
showSpellSlotBubbles.Hint: Shows remaining spell slots as full or empty squares, a la DnDBeyond. You will need to close and reopen the character sheet for this setting to take effect
